an9.10:1.1: “Navayime, bhikkhave, puggala ahuneyya pahuneyya dakkhineyya anjalikaraniya anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an9.10:1.3: Araha, arahattaya patipanno, anagami, anagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno, sakadagami, sakadagamiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno, sotapanno, sotapattiphalasacchikiriyaya patipanno, gotrabhu—
an9.10:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, nava puggala ahuneyya …pe… anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
